source.59644468:
! PYTHONPATH=/kaggle/working/SlowFast:/kaggle/working/SlowFast/deep_sort:$PYTHONPATH python ./SlowFast/tools/run_net.py \
        --cfg SlowFast/ava_conf.yaml \
        DEMO.DETECTRON2_WEIGHTS model_final_280758.pkl \
        DEMO.ALPHA 0.0 \
        DEMO.DRAW_STATIC_BOXES False \
        DEMO.INPUT_VIDEO /kaggle/input/obiwan/obiwan-cut.mkv
source.37f3d732:
# SlowFast, a tutorial

SlowFast is model for video action recognition. This notebook is there to explain to you how to use this model. This is a small variant where person tracking was added using DeepSort.
source.1845669e: ### 5) Run the model on the video
source.1c8c12f6: ### 2) Install the code for SlowFast and DeepSort
